result.reason: mRemoteNG uses hardcoded theme colors in its DockPanel tab rendering that override Windows High Contrast accessibility settings, breaking accessibility compliance.
result.approach: Detect SystemInformation.HighContrast at theme application time and fall back to SystemColors for tab backgrounds, text, and borders instead of hardcoded theme values when High Contrast mode is active.

attempts.raw_output:
